text: Josh Clark (@globalmoxie) is stopping by our office sometime on Monday. Details to follow. (Will crosspost in events, though it's less of an event than a meet & greet + office tour, courtesy of our friend Jason Grigsby. (But there is the final Mobile Portland event on Monday - would love to have an Uncorked presence there!)
OMG. He's one of my long time heroes. Watched him speak at AEA last year and he was awesome.

attachments.title: Thierry Ambraisse - Art Director & Photographer
attachments.text: I'm a french Art Director and Digital Designer based in Paris. ex Art director @SN_Studio
